This is one of a series of booklets on activities supported by
the Ford Foundation. The purpose is to present informally
and in a general, nontechnical way the story of some phase of
the Foundationâ€™s work. Additional copies may be obtained
from the Ford Foundation, Office of Reports, 477 Madison
Avenue, New York 22, N. Y.
Library of Congress Card No. 61-11205
March 1961
